news.title: Whirlwind day of White House talks could reshape Ukraine's future
news.summary: The Washington meeting could prove to be crucial to the future of Ukraine, and all of Europe's security.

news.title: BBC witnesses Israeli settlers' attack on Palestinian farm in West Bank
news.summary: A BBC team was interviewing a Palestinian farmer when masked men charged towards them.

news.title: Man guilty over role in shooting of girl, 9
news.summary: Javon Riley is found guilty over his role in the shooting of a girl at a restaurant in east London.

news.title: I saw a kaleidoscopic light before going blind, says survivor of Laos methanol poisoning
news.summary: Calum Macdonald and the families of three people who died in South East Asia call on the Foreign Office for clearer travel advice.

news.title: 'I'm such a feminist, but Bond has to be a guy,' says Dame Helen Mirren
news.summary: The Oscar-winning actor says that the famous 007 character can't be a woman as it "just doesn't work".

news.title: First group of Gaza children to be brought to UK 'in coming weeks'
news.summary: A group of between 30 to 50 Palestinian children will be evacuated under the plan, the BBC understands.

news.title: 'Skibidi' and 'tradwife' among words added to Cambridge Dictionary
news.summary: More than 6,000 new terms feature, including some relating to remote working and rich tech giants.

news.title: Expect smaller broccoli if heatwave continues, farmers warn
news.summary: The British Growers Association warns that supplies of broccoli are 'tight' thanks to the heatwave.

news.title: Swatch sorry for 'slanted eyes' ad after China uproar
news.summary: The image of a model pulling the corners of his eyes resembled a racist image, critics say.

news.title: Spain and Portugal fires kill two more as Spanish troops battle blazes
news.summary: Spain has sent 500 more troops to wildfire-affected regions, bringing the total deployed to 1,900.
